attributes.action: give offenders released from prison priority housing and more help to stop re offending
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people released from prison have no housing and no financial  help to get out of  the habit of re offending so we have a constant circle of re offending as we all need money to servive and no benifits or housing  will cause a person to re offend
